mapper.select: select count(c.course_id) from course as c , user as u , student_course as sc where c.course_id =sc.course_id and sc.student_id = #{studentId} and u.user_id=c.teacher_id and (c.course_name like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or u.username like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT into course(course_name, course_description, teacher_id, semester,academic_year ) value (#{courseName}, #{courseDescription}, #{teacherId}, #{semester}, #{academicYear})
